page.title: 17THE ARTS IN SALISBURY
page.content: One of the most important festivals that takes place each year is the {Salisbury Festival,}a celebration of the arts in Salisbury in which exhibitions, demonstrations and displays, musical events and drama all take place.{St Thomas's church}holds a smaller festival every other year. However, if you want to see the arts in Salisbury and it's not festival time,{the Playhouse, St. Edmund's Arts {Centre}and{the Library}all have regular exhibitions and other activities taking place. The Playhouse has one large theatre and the smaller Salberg Studio so that two plays can be run at the same time. The Playhouse also has a bar, a restaurant and an art gallery. Films can be seen at the three screen{Odeon.
